name: Riverside Stadium
description: Home of Middlesbrough FC—sports, concerts, and community events.

name: Tees Transporter Bridge
description: Iconic 1911 bridge—engineering heritage and panoramic views.

name: Infinity Bridge
description: Striking pedestrian bridge over the Tees—great evening lights.

name: Preston Park Museum
description: Local history museum with Victorian street and riverside park.

name: Ropner Park
description: Victorian parkland, lake, and seasonal events—family friendly.

name: Billingham Forum
description: Leisure complex with ice arena, pool, gym, and theatre.

name: MIMA
description: Modern art gallery with exhibitions, learning, and community.

name: Albert Park
description: Large town park with lake, sports, and seasonal fairs.
